content: learn to crochet this mini chick keychain amigurumi with this free and easy pattern this cute easy design is perfect for beginners and can be completed within an hour use any yarn you like create a small keychain sized chick with sport weight cotton yarn or make a larger plush version using super bulky chenille yarn the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable chick amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-chick-crochet-pattern/ link to youtube video tutorial https //youtu be/uk6sd3mjlwi
